"A.P.241/10/17": "Ah, hello. Sorry about the other day."
"Hero is Hero. It's already been approved, the name won't be changed."
"I was the one who named the class that. It was the only name that I believed would be fitting."

"You Guardians and everyone in ARKS are
heroes. I don't want you to ever forget that."
"Some years ago, I was on Ship 128 Themis when it was attacked by Darkers."

"At the time, I wasn't in ARKS yet, and still a child.
I was afraid of the darkers that got into the residential district."
"At the time I thought... \"I will die here\""

"But then ARKS personnel came in and
took them down quickly. They saved me."

"I couldn't express my gratitude then.
And when I looked back, I thought to
myself \"that is what a hero is.\""
"I wanted to become someone like that. To have the power to save others."
"So I could remember that feeling, I made it the name of the class."
"Everyone in ARKS is more heroic than they think."
"So if they use the class name, I hope they think more like that. That's the story"
"When I use the class, I think to myself, I must try harder and never give in."
"Right, Energy Recharge complete! Thanks for listening to me."
